title.narrative: TEAM: Time-critical Emergency Agriculture inputs assistance to Marginal and food insecure farming households to mitigate impacts of COVID-19 and ongoing food crisis

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to protect the agriculture livelihoods of vulnerable marginal farming households from the adverse impacts of COVID-19 shock and worsening of existing food crisis. This FAO project provides winter wheat production packages including wheat seeds and fertilizer, and training, information dissemination and awareness building on COVID-19 safety measures to adopt at farm level practices. The project provides life-saving assistance to 260400 people, including 52,210 women, 51,950 men, over 150,000 children, including 7,000 people with disabilities.
